requirement_tested: Create a user registration and login system for women to access the health survey
user_persona: A new female user named Sarah who wants to participate in the health survey.
user_goal: To successfully register and log into the health survey portal.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting Registration Page
narrative_steps.description: Sarah visits the health survey portal for the first time and decides to create an account. She sees the option to register and clicks on it.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Register' link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The view switches to show the extended registration form with fields for first name, last name, email, date of birth, password, and confirm password.

narrative_steps.title: Filling Registration Form
narrative_steps.description: Sarah fills out all required registration fields accurately, ensuring her information meets the gender validation rule.
narrative_steps.action: Enter valid personal details including female gender confirmation.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All fields are filled without error messages, and the 'Register' button becomes enabled.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Registration
narrative_steps.description: Confident that everything is correct, Sarah submits her registration form.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Register' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The system validates inputs, registers Sarah successfully, and redirects her to the dashboard with a welcome message.

narrative_steps.title: Logging In After Logout
narrative_steps.description: Later, Sarah returns to the site and needs to log back in using her newly created credentials.
narrative_steps.action: Enter valid email and password, then click 'Login'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Sarah is authenticated and redirected to her dashboard.

requirement_tested: Design a dashboard for users to view available health surveys and their submission status
user_persona: A returning user named Maria interested in checking available surveys.
user_goal: Maria wants to see which surveys she can take and the status of previous submissions.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Dashboard
narrative_steps.description: Maria logs into the health survey portal and lands on her dashboard.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the dashboard after login.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Maria sees a two-panel layout showing available surveys on the left and her submission history with status badges on the right.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Available Survey
narrative_steps.description: Maria notices a new survey titled 'Annual Health Checkup' and decides to start it.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Annual Health Checkup' survey card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: She is navigated to the multi-page form for that specific survey.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Submission Status
narrative_steps.description: After completing a survey earlier, Maria wants to verify its approval status.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a previous submission entry in the right panel.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A detailed view of her submitted responses opens, showing the current status (e.g., Approved).

requirement_tested: Implement a multi-page health survey form with various question types (text, multiple choice, checkboxes, dropdowns)
user_persona: A user named Lisa taking a comprehensive health survey.
user_goal: Lisa aims to complete a multi-page health survey by answering different types of questions.

narrative_steps.title: Starting First Page
narrative_steps.description: Lisa begins filling out the first page of the survey which includes text input and multiple-choice questions.
narrative_steps.action: Answer text and multiple choice questions, then click 'Next'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Navigation proceeds to the next page since no validation errors exist.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating Through Pages
narrative_steps.description: On the second page, Lisa encounters checkbox groups and dropdown selects.
narrative_steps.action: Complete checkbox and dropdown selections, then click 'Next'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The form progresses to the subsequent page smoothly.

narrative_steps.title: Returning to Previous Page
narrative_steps.description: Realizing she missed something on the prior page, Lisa goes back to make corrections.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Previous' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Lisa is taken back to the previous page without triggering validation.

requirement_tested: Add real-time form validation to ensure required fields are completed before submission
user_persona: A meticulous user named Emma filling out a health survey.
user_goal: Emma wants to ensure all required fields are properly filled before moving forward or submitting.

narrative_steps.title: Leaving Required Field Blank
narrative_steps.description: While filling the survey, Emma accidentally skips a required field and tries to proceed.
narrative_steps.action: Leave a required field blank and click 'Next'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Inline red error message appears beneath the unfilled field, preventing progression.

narrative_steps.title: Correcting Validation Error
narrative_steps.description: Emma notices the error and fills in the missing information.
narrative_steps.action: Fill the previously empty required field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Error message disappears, and the 'Next' button becomes active again.

narrative_steps.title: Proceeding Without Errors
narrative_steps.description: With all required fields now complete, Emma continues with confidence.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Next' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Navigation proceeds to the next page without issues.

requirement_tested: Include a save draft functionality allowing users to pause and resume survey completion
user_persona: A busy professional named Olivia needing to pause mid-survey.
user_goal: Olivia wants to temporarily save her progress so she can finish the survey later.

narrative_steps.title: Saving Progress Mid-Way
narrative_steps.description: Halfway through the survey, Olivia receives an urgent call and must leave immediately.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Save Draft' button located in the form footer.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Current answers are serialized and saved via API, followed by a brief success notification overlay.

narrative_steps.title: Resuming Later
narrative_steps.description: Later that day, Olivia returns to continue where she left off.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate back to the survey from the dashboard.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Previously entered responses are automatically loaded from the draft, allowing seamless continuation.

requirement_tested: Build a survey submission confirmation system with unique reference numbers
user_persona: A cautious user named Ava who just finished her health survey.
user_goal: Ava wants assurance that her submission was received along with proof of completion.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Completed Survey
narrative_steps.description: Having completed all pages, Ava clicks the final 'Submit' button.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Submit' button at the end of the survey.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A full-screen confirmation modal appears displaying a unique HS-###### reference number.

narrative_steps.title: Noting Reference Number
narrative_steps.description: Ava carefully reads the confirmation message and notes down her reference number.
narrative_steps.action: Read and acknowledge the displayed reference number.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The reference number follows the pattern HS-[YYYYMMDD]-[XXXX] and is clearly presented.

narrative_steps.title: Returning to Dashboard
narrative_steps.description: Feeling assured, Ava chooses to go back to the main dashboard.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Return to Dashboard' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The confirmation screen closes and Ava is redirected to the dashboard, with the submission logged.

requirement_tested: Develop an admin portal for data management including viewing, editing, and deleting submitted surveys
user_persona: An administrator named Dr. Chen responsible for managing health data.
user_goal: Dr. Chen needs to review, edit, and manage submitted survey data efficiently.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Admin Portal
narrative_steps.description: Dr. Chen logs in with administrative privileges and accesses the data management section.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the admin portal via sidebar menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A sortable/filterable grid appears with columns for User Name, Survey Title, Submission Date, Status, and Actions.

narrative_steps.title: Editing Survey Data
narrative_steps.description: Dr. Chen identifies a submission requiring correction and initiates an edit.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Edit' action for a specific row.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The survey response data loads into an editable form for modification.

narrative_steps.title: Deleting Erroneous Entry
narrative_steps.description: Upon reviewing another entry, Dr. Chen determines it's invalid and opts to delete it.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Delete' action for the erroneous entry.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A secondary confirmation dialog prompts Dr. Chen before deletion occurs.

requirement_tested: Implement role-based permission management system with different access levels for users and administrators
user_persona: A regular user named Jessica attempting to access restricted areas.
user_goal: Jessica mistakenly tries to reach administrative features but should be blocked appropriately.

narrative_steps.title: Attempting Unauthorized Access
narrative_steps.description: Jessica, unaware of her limitations, manually enters an admin URL path in the browser.
narrative_steps.action: Try accessing an admin-only route directly via address bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Authorization middleware blocks access and redirects Jessica to a general access-denied landing page.

narrative_steps.title: Observing Limited Interface
narrative_steps.description: Jessica browses normally but observes certain advanced options are absent from menus.
narrative_steps.action: Browse the standard user interface looking for administrative controls.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: No hidden sections or administrative tools are visible to Jessica due to her role permissions.

requirement_tested: Create data review functionality for authorized personnel to verify and approve submitted health information
user_persona: A reviewer named Mr. Patel tasked with approving health submissions.
user_goal: Mr. Patel wants to evaluate and either approve or reject pending health submissions.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Pending Submission
narrative_steps.description: Mr. Patel logs in and finds a submission marked as 'Pending Review'.
narrative_steps.action: Open the pending submission for review.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: An expanded response viewer appears with decision-making tools like Approve/Reject buttons and comment fields.

narrative_steps.title: Approving Valid Submission
narrative_steps.description: After careful examination, Mr. Patel confirms the submission is accurate and approves it.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Approve' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A structured payload is sent to the webhook, updating the workflow state and refreshing the UI instantly.

narrative_steps.title: Rejecting Incomplete Submission
narrative_steps.description: Another submission has missing information, prompting Mr. Patel to reject it with feedback.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Reject' button after entering explanatory comments.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Response metadata is updated with rejection notes and the status reflects 'Rejected'.

requirement_tested: Design reporting dashboard with visual charts and exportable summary statistics
user_persona: A researcher named Dr. Williams analyzing health trends.
user_goal: Dr. Williams seeks to visualize aggregated data and export findings for further analysis.

narrative_steps.title: Applying Report Filters
narrative_steps.description: Dr. Williams wants to analyze data filtered by age group and geographic region.
narrative_steps.action: Adjust the Age Group and Geographic Region filter options.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: AJAX query updates the D3.js rendered charts to reflect the refined dataset scope.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Updated Charts
narrative_steps.description: With filters applied, Dr. Williams examines the updated visualizations.
narrative_steps.action: Observe the refreshed bar graphs and pie charts.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Charts dynamically adjust to represent filtered data clearly and interactively.

narrative_steps.title: Exporting Reports
narrative_steps.description: Satisfied with the visualization, Dr. Williams exports the data for presentation purposes.
narrative_steps.action: Click the '.pdf' export button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Server-side generates a downloadable PDF file attachment ready for use.

requirement_tested: Set up secure data storage system for collected health information with encryption
user_persona: A compliance officer named Robert auditing data security practices.
user_goal: Robert wants to ensure that all sensitive health data is securely encrypted during storage.

narrative_steps.title: Inserting New Record
narrative_steps.description: A new health survey submission triggers a write operation to the database.
narrative_steps.action: Submit a fresh health survey entry.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Inserted data undergoes automatic AES-256-CBC encryption managed by AWS KMS prior to PostgreSQL storage.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Infrastructure Security
narrative_steps.description: Robert reviews the setup ensuring TLS connections and IAM policies protect data access.
narrative_steps.action: Audit database connection settings and firewall configurations.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: TLS-enabled PostgreSQL instance behind VPC firewall enforces strict IAM policies confirming secure handling.

requirement_tested: Implement responsive web design compatible with desktop and mobile devices
user_persona: A mobile user named Zoe accessing the portal on her smartphone.
user_goal: Zoe wants to seamlessly navigate and complete surveys regardless of device size.

narrative_steps.title: Using Mobile Device
narrative_steps.description: Zoe opens the portal on her phone and starts browsing available surveys.
narrative_steps.action: Load the website on a smartphone screen.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Layout adapts to mobile breakpoint with flexible grids, scaled fonts, and finger-friendly tap targets.

narrative_steps.title: Switching Between Devices
narrative_steps.description: Later, Zoe continues on her laptop to finalize a draft started on mobile.
narrative_steps.action: Resize browser window to simulate desktop usage.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Media queries trigger reflow adjusting structure optimally for larger screens while preserving consistency.

requirement_tested: Apply whitesmoke background color and dark cyan component styling throughout the application
user_persona: A UX designer named Mia evaluating brand consistency across platforms.
user_goal: Mia wants to confirm uniform application of the prescribed color palette.

narrative_steps.title: Evaluating Visual Consistency
narrative_steps.description: Mia inspects various parts of the application to check adherence to the defined color scheme.
narrative_steps.action: Visit multiple pages and hover over interactive elements.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Site renders against whitesmoke backdrop (#F5F5F5) with dark cyan accents (#008B8B) consistently applied to headers, buttons, and links.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Hover Effects
narrative_steps.description: Mia tests interactive states to ensure they maintain visual harmony.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over clickable regions such as buttons and links.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Subtle shade variations derived from global color palette enhance discoverability while preserving contrast ratios.

requirement_tested: Include user profile management section for personal information and survey history
user_persona: A user named Grace updating her contact details and reviewing past participation.
user_goal: Grace wants to update her personal information and see her survey history.

narrative_steps.title: Editing Personal Information
narrative_steps.description: Grace notices outdated contact info and updates her phone number.
narrative_steps.action: Modify the phone number field in the profile editor.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The 'Save Changes' CTA activates, allowing Grace to commit the update.

narrative_steps.title: Saving Profile Updates
narrative_steps.description: Grace saves her revised contact information.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Save Changes' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: PATCH request modifies user attributes and the UI refreshes to show updated data.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Survey History
narrative_steps.description: Grace scrolls through her survey timeline to recall past completions.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll through the right-side list of past surveys.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Chronological list displays each survey with clear status tags indicating completion stages.

requirement_tested: Add audit trail functionality to track data access and modifications by authorized users
user_persona: An auditor named Mr. Thompson investigating data access logs.
user_goal: Mr. Thompson wants to trace who accessed what data and when for compliance purposes.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Audit Logs
narrative_steps.description: Mr. Thompson accesses the audit trail module to begin his investigation.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the audit trail viewer.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Sortable tabular audit trail indexed by descending timestamps appears with relevant filters above.

narrative_steps.title: Narrowing Search Criteria
narrative_steps.description: To find specific actions, Mr. Thompson applies filters to reduce noise.
narrative_steps.action: Update Time Period and Actor Role filter criteria.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Filtered search narrows displayed entries to match specified conditions improving investigative clarity.
